Package view

Class SimpleStockView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.SimpleStockView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvancedStockViewImpl
    public class SimpleStockView
extends java.lang.Object
implements StockView
    The SimpleStockView class is a simple implementation of the StockView interface, which displays data by writing it to the appendable given on create. (used in mainly for writing to console). This class is used to display the data given to it in the text format (usually in the console).
